channel.title: linux on Zxd's Blog

item.title: CentOS上安装nvm
item.description: CentOS上安装nvm 先按照curl,标准CentOS库中提供了Curl软件包 1 sudo dnf install curl 安装nvm 1 curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.38.0/install.sh | bash 配置~/.bashrc或~/
